name: Giller
description:
This is a 64x64 pixel game for the #LowRezJam2020.

Here is the controls :

W,A,S,D or Arrow KeysMovementSpaceJumpMouse Click
ShootMouseLookEscapePause Menu

Each a random ammount of time, an Ammo Box and Hotdogs appear on map (for hotdogs there's can only be one in map). Ammo replenish ... well , ammo, and hotdogs add one hit to a max of 9.


For how long can you stay ?
